name: gifAI
author: Webstick

sections.description:
gifAI is an innovative plugin that allows users to effortlessly create custom images based on their content. With DALL-E-based algorithms and a user-friendly interface, gifAI allows you to create amazing visual content.

How to use gifAI?

After installing the plugin, a button will appear next to each post on the site. Clicking on the button will open the plugin and give the user the option to decide whether the creation of the image will be according to the article title, to the article itself, to an existing image, or to a free description text.

Because gifAI is based on the DALL-E creation engine, to use it you need to have an Open AI account. Registration is free, and you can register before installing the plugin or after it does not matter.

How to register? Very simple:

Go to the Open AI website and Sign up
Choose if you want to register with an existing account (Google, Facebook, or Apple) or with your email.

After choosing the desired source, you need to enter more details that will help the plugin achieve the best result. Details such as:
– Style (realistic, cartoonish, Van Gogh, etc.)
– Color palette (if there is a preference)
A graphic description of what is requested to be in the image (if the source is not a text that describes it)

Description example: a person standing on the dock and looking at the sky, painting style of Picasso, in green colors.
The more details you add to the verbal description, the better and more accurate the result will be

After you finish entering the details, you will receive four results, from which you can choose:
– Select and confirm
– Select and improve – choose one of the final results and ask the plugin to run another creation process according to that choice.
– Re-request more – regenerates four more images.
What you choose will be saved in the media library.

Features:

  • Simple & intuitive
  • Responds quickly
  • Immediate results
  • Allows to replace and improve the result

Links:

DALL-E
Website
sections.installation:
INSTALLATION FROM WITHIN WORDPRESS

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for gifAI
  3. Install and activate the gifAI plugin.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  1. Upload the entire gifAI folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Visit Plugins.
  3. Activate the gifAI plugin.

AFTER ACTIVATION

  1. Visit the new gifAI AI Image Generator menu item.
  2. Enter your OpenAI API key to enable the button on the post edit screen’s featured image metabox.
sections.faq:
How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

screenshots.caption: Enter your OpenAI API key under the gifAI AI Image Generator menu item.
Choose what the generated image should be based on.
Choose one of the final results, ask the plugin to run another creation process according to that choice or generate a completely new image.
